original_title: Victory in Dubai for Sri Lankan singer
original_body_lines: It’s, indeed, encouraging to see our performers excel in the music scene, overseas. 17-year-old Lisara Fernando, clinched the title of Best Solo Female Singer at the Dubai Youth Music Festival 2023, organized by Dubai Culture.

Lisara’s remarkable victory not only highlights her exceptional talent but also signals the beginning of an exciting journey in the world of music, complemented by a unique set of opportunities that come with her first-place win.
The Dubai Youth Music Festival, organized by Dubai Culture, stands as a global platform that celebrates and nurtures emerging musical talents.

In the 2023 edition, Lisara Fernando took centre stage, captivating the audience and judges with her soulful voice and electrifying performances. Her ability to connect with the audience and deliver a powerful, emotionally charged performance ultimately earned her the coveted title of Best Solo Female Singer.

As the first-place winner, she received an extraordinary prize package, including a mentorship programme with BMI (Broadcast Music, Inc.), a renowned global music rights organization. This mentorship promises to provide Lisara with invaluable insights and guidance as she navigates the intricacies of the music industry.

Additionally, Lisara was awarded a one-on-one studio recording and production session with two prominent Arabic musicians. This unique opportunity allows her to collaborate with seasoned professionals in the industry, providing her with an enriching experience and the chance to produce a song.
